content.question: Which of the following is the best way for Congress to provide people with disabilities access to the airline industry in light of the Courtâ€™s ruling?

choices.label: Appeal the ruling to the United States Court of Appeals
Override the court with a two-thirds majority in both chambers
Pass a new law that specifies that the airlines must provide access for people with disabilities
Remove members of the Supreme Court who ruled against the law and have the president appoint new justices

content.answer: Pass a new law that specifies that the airlines must provide access for people with disabilities
